sentence: Exquisite best ever hotel we stayed and we travel a lot we know what we are talking about and can see difference we stayed in one bedroom suite very well furnished that made our stay is more comfortable and made us feel like we are on honeymoon
Stayed in the Horizon Club for 5nts and can not fault the room
Since we were very busy throughout our days we enjoyed to have dinner in the privacy and peaceful atmosphere of our large and beautiful room
We stayed at the Garden Wing with pool view for eight nights and everything was perfect
We had a one night stay in a Garden Wing room overlooking the pool
Comfortable room even for 3 of us spare bed was a proper bed
Breakfast in their Summit Room is a lovely way to start the day with a great menu properly served by the attentive staff
Garden wing room exceptionalAl good
Friendly stuffs spacious room variety of breakfast though I did not really have time to enjoy it
And yes even though the rooms were nice no one again congratulated us on our special day no flowers no cake no nothing
Otherwise a very comfortable bed room temperature was perfect and we enjoyed excellent Peking duck at Shang Palace

c the efficient pool staff who were all eagle eyed in ensuring swimmers safety towels were replenished etc d a copy of The Sunday Times appeared magically on my door when I had asked the luggage hold counter for the papers on Saturday I did not offer my room number so was very surprised and happy to get a copy the next day
A view of greenery from the window
What I liked about this wing is that if you are traveling with a couple you are able to get the side by side rooms with a private door for that area
We are a couple travelling with a three year old and chose a garden suite which overlooks the pool
Room was comfortable but being on the creche floor did not make sense
I like it that there were apples in the room
After a couple of minutes and him checking with his manager we were moved to another room
The food was packed up and delivered cold to our room
Jesie delivered my room
you should offer use of mini bar for free for club floor users
The furnishings in the room are worn and the carpet needed changing
Almost 50 years ago room height was lower and there is not enough natural light in the room
I want to taste teas in my room which you sell the tea goods in lobby shop
Unfortunately service at The Line was not on par with the service provided by the front desk team the buds team as well as the house keeping and room service team
Mobile check in did not seem to have the record of my prepayment of my stay when I booked the room months ago
This applied from room service to restaurant outlets
They ’d throw out my in room slippers and not leave new ones Will I return for a fifth time
I was initially going to skip the buffets due to my uneasiness having food laid out in the open amidst this Covid19 but the room service food was so bad I could n’t bring myself to order more
Strong WiFi signal in the room without troublesome login
